text: Budalur block is a revenue block in the Thanjavur district, Tamil Nadu, India. It has 50 panchayat villages. ==Population== The total population of the revenue block is 26,874 according to 2011 Census of India.87th page of http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/3319_PART_B_DCHB_THANJAVUR.pdf ==References== Category:Geography of Tamil Nadu
title: Budalur block
